item.title: 【Cutting the High Cost of Testing Microservices】降低微服务测试的高成本
item.description:
【

A specter is haunting modern development: as our architecture has grown more mature, developer velocity has slowed. item.title: 【How To Conduct Effective Data Security Audits for Big Data Systems】如何对大数据系统进行有效的数据安全审计
item.description:
【

Big data systems are an increasingly common aspect of many business operations. As helpful as such a wealth of information is, these projects can dramatically impact an organization’s cybersecurity posture. Consequently, any company embracing this trend must also embrace the big data security audit.

Why Big Data Security Audits Are Necessary

The sheer size of big data necessitates proactive cybersecurity. Global volumes could reach 181 zettabytes by 2025, leaving businesses with massive amounts of information to safeguard. Failing to secure big data systems could expose countless consumers’ personal details to cybercriminals, incurring significant costs.

】

大数据系统在许多业务运营中越来越常见。尽管如此丰富的信息很有帮助，但这些项目可以极大地影响组织的网络安全态势。因此，任何拥抱这一趋势的公司也必须拥抱大型数据安全审计< /a>.

为什么需要大数据安全审计

大数据的庞大规模需要积极主动的网络安全。到 2025 年，全球数据量可能会达到181 ZB ，让拥有大量信息的企业需要保护。如果无法确保大数据系统的安全，可能会将无数消费者的个人详细信息暴露给网络犯罪分子，从而造成巨大成本。

item.title: 【MLOps: How To Build a Toolkit To Boost AI Project Performance】MLOps：如何构建工具包来提高 AI 项目性能
item.description:
【

Numerous AI projects launched with promise fail to set sail. This is not usually because of the quality of the machine learning (ML) models. Poor implementation and system integration sink 90% of projects. Organizations can save their AI endeavors. They should adopt adequate MLOps practices and choose the right set of tools. This article discusses MLOps practices and tools that can save sinking AI projects and boost robust ones, potentially doubling project launch speed.

MLOps in a Nutshell 

MLOps is a mix of machine learning application development (Dev) and operational activities (Ops). It is a set of practices that helps automate and streamline the deployment of ML models. As a result, the entire ML lifecycle becomes standardized.

】

众多充满希望的人工智能项目未能起航。这通常不是因为机器学习 (ML) 模型的质量。实施和系统集成较差 90% 的项目。组织可以挽救他们的人工智能努力。他们应该采用适当的 MLOps 实践并选择正确的工具集。本文讨论了 MLOps 实践和工具，这些实践和工具可以挽救正在下沉的人工智能项目并促进稳健的项目，从而可能使项目启动速度加倍。

MLOps 概述 

MLOps 是机器学习应用程序开发 (Dev) 和运营活动 (Ops) 的结合。它是一组有助于自动化和简化 ML 模型部署的实践。因此，整个机器学习生命周期变得标准化。

item.title: 【Order in Chaos: Python Configuration Management for Enterprise Applications】混乱中的秩序：企业应用程序的 Python 配置管理
item.description:
【

Importance of Configuration Management

In enterprise applications, configuration management is the most underrated operator that keeps everything integrated and running smoothly. It acts as a backstage manager ensuring all lights are in place, theatrical queues are ready, and the show can go on without a hiccup. Especially, while dealing with multi-environment deployments, with tight-knit CI/CD processes, one wrong configuration can pose an application-wide shutdown risk. 

Multi-environment enterprise applications carry their own set of challenges and managing configs is no exception. We all have heard the famous “But, it was working on my machine!” excuse more times than daily salutations.

】

配置管理的重要性

在企业应用程序中，配置管理是最被低估的操作者，它可以保持一切集成并顺利运行。它充当后台经理，确保所有灯光都就位、剧院队列准备就绪、演出可以顺利进行。特别是，在处理多环境部署时，使用紧密的 CI/CD 流程，一个错误的配置可能会造成应用程序范围内的关闭风险。 

多环境企业应用程序面临着自己的一系列挑战，管理配置也不例外。我们都听过著名的“但是，它在我的机器上运行！”原谅的次数比每日问候的次数还要多。

item.title: 【My Journey With AWS CDK and Java: What You Need To Know】我的 AWS CDK 和 Java 之旅：您需要了解的内容
item.description:
【

One of the first decisions you’ll need to make when working with the AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) is choosing the language for writing your Infrastructure as Code (IaC). The CDK currently supports TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Java, C#, and Go. Over the past few years, I’ve worked with the CDK in TypeScript, Python, and Java. While there is ample information available online for TypeScript and Python, this post aims to share my experience using Java as the language of choice for the AWS CDK.

Wait…What? Use Java With the AWS CDK?

Some may say that TypeScript is the most obvious language to use while working with the AWS CDK. The CDK itself is written in TypeScript and it’s also the most used language according to the 2023 CDK Community Survey. Java is coming in 3rd place with a small percentage of use.

】

使用 AWS 云开发套件 (CDK)< 时需要做出的首要决定之一< /a> 正在选择用于编写基础架构即代码 (IaC) 的语言。 CDK 目前支持 TypeScript、JavaScript、Python、Java、C# 和 Go。在过去的几年里，我使用了 TypeScript、Python 和 Java 中的 CDK。虽然网上有大量有关 TypeScript 和 Python 的信息，但本文旨在分享我使用 Java 作为 AWS CDK 的首选语言的经验。

等等……什么？将 Java 与 AWS CDK 结合使用？

有人可能会说，TypeScript 是使用 AWS CDK 时最明显的语言。 CDK 本身是用 TypeScript 编写的，它也是最常用的语言根据 2023 年 CDK 社区调查< /a>. Java 排在第三位，使用比例很小。

item.title: 【Overcoming Alert Fatigue: A Team's Journey to Effective Incident Response】克服警报疲劳：团队的有效事件响应之旅
